      • addObserver

        public void addObserver(HTTPStreamObserver o)
        Add a HTTP observer. If the observer is the first arriving one, or an unsubscription is made before, then make subscription.
        Parameters:
        o -

      • removeObserver

        public void removeObserver(HTTPStreamObserver o)
        Remove a HTTP observer. If the observer is the last one and no unsubscription is made before, then make unsubscription.
        Parameters:
        o -
